scripts.genkeys: openssl req -nodes -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout ./servers/ssl.key -out ./servers/ssl.cert -outform PEM -keyform PEM -new -x509 -sha256 -days 365 -subj '/C=US/ST=Grovers Mills/L=Grovers Mills/O=Yoyodyne Propulsion Systems/OU=The Pittt/CN=localhost'
scripts.prepare-tests: mkdir -p www && ls -d www/* | grep -v README.md | xargs rm -rf
scripts.serve: echo 'goto http://localhost:12340/playground/index.html?manifest=../console/manifest.json' && PORT=12340 DEBUG=LDP*,AppStore* ./servers/run LDP AppStore console:console test:test playground:playground
scripts.test: npm run prepare-tests && PORT=12345 nyc mocha --slow 300 test/*.test.js test/apps/*.test.js
scripts.test:quiet: npm run prepare-tests && npm run test:client-silent && npm run prepare-tests && npm run test:server-no-clean
scripts.test:client-silent: SHAPETREE=client PORT=12345 nyc --silent mocha --slow 300 --reporter mocha-slow-options --reporter-options useReporter=spec,mediumPercent=100 test/shape-trees.test.js
scripts.test:server-no-clean: PORT=12345 nyc --no-clean mocha --slow 300 --reporter mocha-slow-options --reporter-options useReporter=spec,mediumPercent=100 test/*.test.js test/apps/*.test.js
